entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 5:52 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: E 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to rain or snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Lake Ontario. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
